P. Hydras::

"how?"asked interested Hydras Hydras"Unicron's minions had visited 
them, and they could handle varely with his minions but a very 
powerfull one was captured"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Vykos: Very machiavellian of you, I admit, but you risk our hands 
> too much. What if we make Unicron believe that the Maximals have 
the 
> Matrix so he sends warriors on them? They would get hurt much more 
> than we would.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > P. Hydras:
> > 
> > "Not sure... "said gloomy Hydras"Maximals have the clue to find 
> > MAtrix of leadership, that's it's the only thing that can defeat 
> > that monster and Unicron doesn't need to strike a deal with us. 
In

> opinion,

> work

> or

at

were

by

Modern

hold
